name: User Discovery Via Get-ADUser Cmdlet
description: Detects usage of the Get-ADUser cmdlet to collect user information
false_positives: Legitimate admin scripts may use the same technique, it's better to exclude specific computers or users who execute these commands or scripts often
query: ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(/[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/)) AND (process.command_line:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Aa][Dd][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Ff][Ii][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ \\.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) OR process.pe.original_file_name:(PowerShell.EXE OR pwsh.dll)) AND (process.command_line:*Get\-ADUser\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-Filter\ \*))`
